name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-graph-meeting-notification-nodejs
title: Online Teams Meeting Subscription
shortDescription: This sample application showcases online meeting subscriptions that notify users in chat about meeting events, including when users join or leave and when meetings start or end.
longDescription: This sample application demonstrates the use of online meeting subscriptions in Microsoft Teams, sending real-time chat notifications for events such as user joins/leaves and meeting start/end. Built with Node.js, it features bot interactions, change notifications, and integrates with the Microsoft Graph API for seamless communication.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing graph meeting notification in meeting chat

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
